page.title: 18Ceramic Research Association
page.content: The B.C.R.A. is the largest such institute in the world.It began in 1920 in the middle of Stoke.Pottery industries put money together to form the Association.There are 250 people working there,half of whom are scientists.Ceramics include sanitary ware,sewage pipes,bricks,tiles,light sockets,space-ship nozzles etc.Ceramic is a Greek word meaning clay.Now they are making new materials by adding chemicals intended for car engines because they can withstand great heat. They have found ways of reproducing coloured slide photographs on to plates In their work for the government a material,zircoma, has been invented which is light enough to be used as armour clothing or on helicopters.
